Title: Preparing for the Unknown
Description:
This will be a long process. Longer, I fear, than Dagran can stay here in the Isles.

But perhaps... 

There are many titan relics I can use as "keys" to unlocking information in the mainframe or to repair it. That may make the process go more quickly.

Only time will tell.

You have helped us enough, $n. Go back to Moira and tell her what we have discovered.
ObjectivesText: Return to Moira Thaurissan in Dornogal.
RewardText:
Well, I know where to find Dagran if I'm missin' him.

It's good tae see him so happy an' in his element. He's done me proud.

Thank ye for helpin' him along the way.
